pullRequest.title: Add Plugin for BootsFaces in order to support <b:dataTable
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hi,
I am using NetBeans with BootsFaces (https://www.bootsfaces.net/). It works quite good, but the autocomplete fails on tags, which create scoped variables like <b:dataTable value=[ListOfType<B>] var="x"/> which creates a scoped variable x of type B.
I just copied the @ServiceProvider(service = TagFeatureProvider.class) from the PrimeFaces plugin, but since the org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi does not seem to expose this API I had to add my plugin as friend module.
I failed at creating a standalone module without adding a friend module, so my question is if you would include this module or what would be the correct way to add this functionality?
I also thought about a more generic plugin, where the user can specify a list of tags (namespace, tagName, var, value) which enables autocomplete in EL for those without creating a separate plugin for every taglib.

commit.message: Add Plugin for BootsFaces in order to support <b:dataTable

+package org.netbeans.modules.web.bootsfaces;
+
+import java.util.Collection;
+import java.util.Collections;
+import org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi.api.Attribute;
+import org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi.api.Library;
+import org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi.api.Tag;
+import org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi.api.TagFeature;
+import org.netbeans.modules.web.jsfapi.spi.TagFeatureProvider;
+import org.openide.util.lookup.ServiceProvider;
+
+/**
+ * {@link TagFeatureProvider} for BootsFaces.
+ * 
+ * @author toster
+ */
+@ServiceProvider(service = TagFeatureProvider.class)
+public class BootsFacesTagFeatureProvider implements TagFeatureProvider {
+
+    private static final String BOOTSFACES_UI_NAMESPACE = "http://bootsfaces.net/ui";
